Package org.framed.orm.ui.editor

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractGraphicalEditor
    This class have to be inherited by the ORMGraphicalEditor.
    Activator
    The activator class controls the plug-in life cycle Generated from eclipse.
    EditorChangeNotifier  
    ORMCellEditorLocator
    This class creates a small editor for label editing and locates it correctly.
    ORMDirectEditManager
    Manages the direct edit operation by creating and maintaining the org.eclipse.jface.viewers.CellEditor and executing the resulting command if the cell editor value has changed.
    ORMGraphicalEditor
    The GraphicalEditor you can see.
    ORMGraphicalEditorActionBarContributor
    This is the ActionBarContributor for the ORMMultiPageEditor/ ORMGraphicalEditor, which adds UndoRetargetAction, RedoRetargetAction, DeleteRetargetAction, gridaction and snapaction to the workbench actionbar.
    ORMGraphicalEditorContextMenuProvider
    This ContextMenuProvider provides the context menu for the ORMGraphicalEditor.
    ORMGraphicalEditorPalette
    This class provides the palett and it's entrys for the ORMGraphicalEditor.
    ORMMultiPageEditor
    This MultiPageEditorPart has as pages the behaviour ORMGraphicalEditor and the data ORMGraphicalEditor.
    ORMPaletteViewerProvider
    PaletteViewerProvider provides a standard way of creating palette viewers that can be shared across different clients that need to create a palette (PaletteViewerPage and FlyoutPaletteComposite, for instance).
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ORMGraphicalEditor.EditorType
    This enum describes the editor type, which can be COMPARTMENT or ROLES.
